sait.bms.managers

Class Managers

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.managers.Managers

  • public class Managers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the manager for the problem domain. It contains all the utility methods
    Author:
    Allyssa Preece, Anusone Soula, Aiden Kopec

                   throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:

      • findBook

        private void findBook()

      • displayType

        private void displayType()
        Displays a list of books based on each book format/diet/genre/frequency. This method will ask the user for which book type they want to narrow their search for. After selecting a book, the application will list several types of genres based on the book chosen. The method will then print out the matching books in a formatted table.

      • saveBooks

        private void saveBooks(java.util.ArrayList<Book> myBooks)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the contents of MyBooks back to the books file in a formatted list
        Parameters:
        myBooks - ArrayList of the Books
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
